title: AT&T
meta_description: A visual helper for the 3 requirements needed for AT&T passwords on their website and mobile app.

sections.name: Requirements
shortcuts: Cannot be the same as your login ID
Must be between 6 and 24 characters long
May not be all letters or all numbers

sections.name: Additional Info
shortcuts: Passwords can contain uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens.
